location: Xinyi Road Section 5, Lane 150 - Cotton Field (棉花田) community, near Muzha Mountain Trailhead Station
notes: Bright 2BR apartment with floor-to-ceiling windows, Taipei 101 views, and natural light throughout (no dark rooms). Fully furnished with elevator access on 14th floor. For baby safety: balcony present - verify railing height/gaps; large windows may need childproofing. Well-managed building in quiet residential area, though no pets policy and NT$56k rent is on the higher end.
